item.ordinarytinker.mekatool.description: An atomic decomposition machine similar to mekanism,Can mine various items and ignore mining level,Buttons can be configured to switch speeds
item.ordinarytinker.soulge.description: A powerful weapon that can simultaneously attack multiple targets from a distance and kill them when the execution threshold is reached
item.ordinarytinker.trident.description: Not much different from the original Trident
gui.ordinarytinker.fluid_plate.descripti:
fluid plate is a liquid-storing armor that provides damage reduction based on stored fluids. When storing water, it periodically extinguishes fire around the wearer. When containing lava, it reduces incoming damage while converting a portion of the damage into flame retaliation damage. All four armor pieces synergize to reduce damage
Independent of each other
tool_stat.ordinarytinker.soulge_heart.de: The range of the tool,This is where you can mark and damage your target,Up to 100 tiles
tool_stat.ordinarytinker.soulge_heart.ex: The number of attackable stacks applied to a single right-click attack target,Stacks up to three times the number of base layers
tool_stat.ordinarytinker.soulge_heart.at: Every this tick consumes a layer of the target's sigil and takes effect
tool_stat.ordinarytinker.soulge_heart.ki: Targets below this maximum health percentage will be direct kill
tool_stat.ordinarytinker.fluid_escape.ba: Basic consumption value of fluid,The basic amount consumed for each reduction in actual damage
tool_stat.ordinarytinker.fluid_escape.co: The basic fluid consumption will be additionally multiplied by this value, and the result obtained will be the final consumption
tool_stat.ordinarytinker.fluid_escape.da: Damage reduction corresponding to a single armor
tool_stat.ordinarytinker.fluid_escape.fl: The amount of fluid that can be stored
material.ordinarytinker.armorsteel.flavo: Because I'm afraid of pain, my ability is all used for defense
material.ordinarytinker.armorsteel.encyc: Dramatically increases your defense against low damage
modifier.ordinarytinker.crawl.descriptio: your soulge will grab target and slash it in front of you just as it is about to kill it
modifier.ordinarytinker.riptide.descript: Enhanced version of the torrent,In rain and water, it will go into riptide,Level up entries to increase the whitewater sprint distance
modifier.ordinarytinker.seabless.descrip: Durability consumption in water or rain is reduced by 50%
modifier.ordinarytinker.loyal.descriptio: The tool will be returned to your hand when it is thrown！
modifier.ordinarytinker.lightningbolt.de: The lightning strike effect can be triggered on rainy days
modifier.ordinarytinker.crcs.description: So that you are no longer dependent on water,Free sprints are available,And the main hand is sometimes completely immune to fall damage
modifier.ordinarytinker.crcs.flavor: The god of the sea wishes me！
modifier.ordinarytinker.sophisticated.de: Boosts the tool's 400 base durability,If the tool is a melee tool, it adds an additional 8% attack speed per level,If it is armor, it adds 1 Tenacity and armor per level
modifier.ordinarytinker.marihalo.descrip: Grants Mari's halo visual effect when equipped. Repels nearby creepers.
modifier.ordinarytinker.hoshinohalo.desc: Grants Hoshino's halo visual effect when equipped. Reduces damage taken by 8% and increases all damage dealt by 8%.
modifier.ordinarytinker.hoshinohalo.flav: Even standing still feels so hot...
modifier.ordinarytinker.azusahalo.descri: Grants Azusa's halo visual effect when equipped. Reduces incoming damage by 6% while flying.
modifier.ordinarytinker.reisahalo.descri: Grants Reisa's halo visual effect when equipped. Deals 8% more damage to undead enemies and reduces all damage taken by 8%.
modifier.ordinarytinker.natsuhalo.descri: Grants Natsu's halo visual effect when equipped. 'slurp' modifier reduces milk consumption by 90%. Restores 15% max HP after drinking milk.
modifier.ordinarytinker.al1shalo.descrip: Grants Alice's halo visual effect when equipped. Increases magic damage dealt by 12% but increases magic damage taken by 3%.
modifier.ordinarytinker.armorcoating.des: Blocks damage from the total level of the full body entry x armor x 0.1,When this value exceeds the damage taken,You are completely immune to this damage,As armor, it also increases base armor by 10%.
modifier.ordinarytinker.armorcoating.fla: Failed to penetrate the target armor
modifier.ordinarytinker.dementors.descri: 每次攻击/每次受有来源的伤有3%概率汲取目标灵魂至工具中,受到致命伤害会消耗灵魂10层来抵挡此次死亡,至多存储20 x 词条等级层
modifier.ordinarytinker.uncannyvalley.de: 击杀最大生命大于15的生物时会另周围的所有生物恐惧,持续5秒使其远离你并且癫狂的不停摇头,至多移动到30格开外,恐惧状态会丧失一切战意并且移动速度变慢,对猫无效
modifier.ordinarytinker.uncannyvalley.fl: 你们也会畏惧死亡,是么
modifier.ordinarytinker.catspeed.descrip: 提高7%攻击速度和7%箭矢初速度,但是受到的伤害会增加30%
modifier.ordinarytinker.disguise.descrip: 穿戴该装备会让周围20格内猫不再对玩家表现惊慌
fluid_plate.water.tooltip: Reduce the damage you have suffered,Try to extinguish the flames on your body every 0.5 seconds,Each extinguishing consumes 10mb of water
fluid_plate.lava.tooltip: Reduce the damage you have suffered and return some of the damage to the attacker,And set the target on fire
fluid_plate.empty.tooltip: OMG, he's empty. Maybe you need to try adding some water or lava?
